name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Normand TURCOTTE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Normand TURCOTTE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Beaver County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph M. Budicak, Public Defender’s Office, Beaver, for appellant.
John Lee Brown, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., Beaver, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
427 A.2d 1160
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Normand TURCOTTE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 5, 1981.
Decided April 15, 1981.
Joseph M. Budicak, Public Defender’s Office, Beaver, for appellant.
John Lee Brown, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., Beaver, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
